sentences.en: But now was the time to squelch him.
sentences.cn: 不过,现在是压倒他的时候了.
她的创造力受到了压制。

sentences.en: Non - interrupting level setting over a range of 20 dB for reproducible measurement of squelch hysteresis.
sentences.cn: 非 中断级别设置了一系列的20分贝的重复性测量压制滞后.

sentences.en: Specifically, this data may include control information squelch the RF signal and clamp the ramp output.
sentences.cn: 特别地, 这个数据可包括用于抑制射频信号和钳位斜坡输出的控制信息.

sentences.en: The President wants to squelch any perception that the meeting is an attempt to negotiate.
sentences.cn: 总统想要消除任何视本次会议为谈判尝试的看法。

sentences.en: Type of squelch : Tone operated by 150 - Hz signal.
sentences.cn: 型静噪: 基调由150赫兹的信号.

sentences.en: Types of Transmission and Reception: Transmission - Voice and 150 - Hz squelch tone.
sentences.cn: 类型传送和接收: 在传输声音和150赫兹压服口风.

words.tran_cn: 辩论；毫不放松的反击；使对手哑口无言的辩论
噪声控制；嘎吱声；压倒对方的反驳；压碎的一堆
消除；镇压；压碎；使…咯吱咯吱的响

trans.tran_cn: 噪声控制；嘎吱声；压倒对方的反驳；压碎的一堆

trans.tran_en: to stop something from continuing to develop or spread
